author: Adam Janofsky
title: FDA Plans Cybersecurity ‘Go-Team’ to Strengthen Medical Devices
text:
The U.S. Food and Drug Administration is pushing manufacturers and health-care providers to improve the cybersecurity of medical devices, a manifestation of the Internet of Things that can be notably vulnerable to attack. The FDA plans to set up a “go-team” to investigate suspected incidents of compromise in a field where such lapses can have potentially deadly consequences.
Some of the industry’s challenges, such as the need to regularly update equipment that is used in the field for years on end, may be of interest more broadly.
